  • Method Details

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      The game over is checkers occurs when one side has no legal moves left to make, regardless if that comes from not having any legal pieces or just not having any legal moves due to some truly insane board state. This method checks for both.
      Returns:
      a boolean determining if the game is over

    • isNull

      private boolean isNull(int[] move)
      Checks whether the passed array is equal to the value {-1, -1}, which is the null location, or not.
      Parameters:
      move - : The array whose location is being checked.

    • playerOneWon

      public boolean playerOneWon()
      Determines if player 1 was the winner by checking if they have any legal moves. If they do not, then assume player 2 is the winner. This method assumes that the game is over.
      Returns:
      a boolean determining if player 1 won.

    • takeInput

      public void takeInput(int xCoord, int yCoord)
      Takes an x and y coordinate from the view and sends it to the model to process
      Parameters:
      xCoord - : The row value
      yCoord - : The column value

    • startGame

      public void startGame(CheckersView view, ObjectInputStream currSave, String player1, String player2)
      Starts the game. Passes the saved game along to the model
      Parameters:
      view - : The view that works with this controller
      currSave - : The ObjectInputStream containing the saved game
      player1 - : The name of player 1
      player2 - : The name of player 2
